translated: The Paṭṭhāna Treatise🔽The Dhamma Section in Pairs

original: Nakilesaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na kilesam dhammam paṭicca kilesaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā
translated: With a corruption as condition there arises a corruption that is related to it by way of root. (Abbreviated.)

original: Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: hetuyā nava pe vipāke ekam pe avigate nava
translated: With a root as condition there are nine … With an effect as condition there is one … With the inconstant as condition there are nine. (Abbreviated.)
